definition: to increase a bet/to raise (poker)/to raise the stakes
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
to top up/to fill to the brim
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to extract/to remove/to draw (a sales commission, venom from a snake etc)
to input/to throw in/to unload/to put into circulation
to stake out (the boundaries of a property etc)/to demarcate/(engineering etc) to calibrate
